description: Provides a resource to create a layer7 listener of GAAP.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AuthType.description: Authentication type of the layer7 listener. `0` is one-way authentication and `1` is mutual authentication. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTPS` protocol.

CertificateId.description: Certificate ID of the layer7 listener. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTPS` protocol.

ClientCertificateId.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.26.0. Set `client_certificate_ids` instead. ID of the client certificate. Set only when `auth_type` is specified as mutual authentication. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTPS` protocol.

ClientCertificateIds.description: ID list of the client certificate. Set only when `auth_type` is specified as mutual authentication. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTPS` protocol.

ForwardProtocol.description: Protocol type of the forwarding, the available values include `HTTP` and `HTTPS`. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTPS` protocol.

Name.description: Name of the layer7 listener, the maximum length is 30.

Protocol.description: Protocol of the layer7 listener, the available values include `HTTP` and `HTTPS`.
